document.full_text: brook lopez scored 20 points, deron williams added 16 and made the clinching 3-pointer, as the nets extended their longest winning streak in three years.
document.title: n.b.a. roundup: nets top celtics to stretch winning streak to five
lines_and_colors: brook lopez scored 20 points, deron williams added 16 and made the clinching 3-pointer, as the nets extended their longest winning streak in three years.
